name: Joined Friends, Not Food
description:
Guide your fishfriends to their home, keep in mind not every Fish is friend.

You have to Guide your Fishfriends to their home, but only together they are strong!

Move the Camera with WASD - Key.
Press the Left Mouse-Button to set a waypoint for your Fish-Friends.

You have to stay over the Tower to finish the Level.

This Game is made for the GMTK-GameJam 2021

made Marius Messer & Sean Martin
